- Location: Ground-floor exterior window at the living area; white framed glazing with interior blinds.  
- Materials: White vinyl/aluminum frame; concrete/stone sill; glass pane shows a fracture.  
- Notable defect: Diagonal crack across bottom sash of the exterior glass; potential safety hazard and water intrusion risk if glass fails.  
- Debris: Loose metal rod/cord on the exterior sill from blinds; trip/ scratch hazard.  
- Condition: No other obvious staining or moisture visible around this pane in photo; recommend replacing cracked glass and securing hardware.
